name: Tavern Tycoon - Dragon's Hangover
description: Run your fantasy RPG tavern - let travellers take shelter for the night and serve 'em the best mead of their life with a good dose of humor.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-2300, AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 or better with SM5.0 support DirectX: Version 11 Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
